description: This file defines a utility function 'runInSandbox' that creates a sandboxed iframe to execute arbitrary JavaScript code securely. It manages iframe creation, communication via postMessage, error handling, timeouts, and cleanup.

methods.name: runInSandbox({ container, code, onMessage, onComplete, onTimeout, onError })
methods.description: Creates a sandboxed iframe, executes provided JavaScript code within it, manages message communication, error handling, timeout, and returns a cleanup function.

ctags.name: runInSandbox
ctags.pattern: /^export function runInSandbox({ container, code, onMessage, onComplete, onTimeout, onError }) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ container, code, onMessage, onComplete, onTimeout, onError })
